short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unofficial Amazon Music Web Player Extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon Music Web Player Extension. Search & play music in Amazon Music Web Player using 'Specialized Google Search Engine' directly from chrome omnibox (search box).
This is Amazon Music search that allows the user seamlessly search track, albums, artists while surfing the web by navigating to the Amazon Music Web Player Search user interface. 

How to Use
✔️First of all, open Amazon Music Web Player (https://music.amazon.xyz/) or whatever your country specific domain is. Always remain logged in to search and play music seamlessly directly from chrome omni box(search or url box).
✔️Now you can click extension icon to launch search or use omnibox and type "AMZ" enter 'TAB' key and type to search the track of your choice.
✔️When you find the track , music or song you were looking for just click the link.
✔️If you are already logged into Amazon Music you will be able to play it asap else you will be asked to log in.
✔️Enjoy searching music on Amazon Music™ for free!

To provide this functionality extension takes over you default search for seamless experience..

Copyright and Trademarks

Amazon™, Amazon Music™, and their related trademarks, names, and logos are the property of Amazon.com, Inc. The Extension is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or endorsed by Amazon or Amazon Music. All other trademarks, names, and logos used in the Extension are the property of their respective owners.
